insertStudent: INSERT INTO student_records(id, enrollment_no, abc_id, gr_no, aadhar_number, stream, semester, main_course, first_secondary_subject, tertiary_secondary_subject, student_gender, email, whatsapp_no, surname, name, fathername, father_name, mother_name, address, city, district, pincode, birth_date, birth_place, caste, parent_contact_no, last_organization_studied_from, last_studied_year, elective_course, student_image) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
selectAll: SELECT id, enrollment_no, abc_id, gr_no, aadhar_number, stream, semester, main_course, first_secondary_subject, tertiary_secondary_subject, student_gender, email, whatsapp_no, CONCAT(surname, ' ', name, ' ', fathername) as full_name, father_name, mother_name, address, city, district, pincode, birth_date, birth_place, caste, parent_contact_no, last_organization_studied_from, last_studied_year, elective_course FROM student_records
lastGRQuery: SELECT gr_no FROM student_records ORDER BY inserted_at DESC LIMIT 1
